message.content: {"given_definition_quality":90,"better_definition":"the south side; the area to the south","sentence":"学校在南边。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation scene showing a simple school building labeled as '学校' on the left, with a sign or arrow pointing to its location on the south side ('南边').
